name: A Bridge On Mars
description: Part of the series The Game of Life. A small series of digital arts about inequality in contemporary society, about dying alone in the crowd, about abandonment, indifference, and exploitation. A free interpretation of the last minutes of existence, when the little energy that remains distorts the colors of the observed reality and life is swallowed by the contrasts of an unequal society. - Artist: Luiz André Gama - www.luizandregama.com  Date of Creation: 2017 - Size: 4835x7087px.
